site_title: Dollar Bill Glider 3 by Stephen Weiss

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making Paper Plane 009, the Dollar Bill Glider 3 by Stephen Weiss. This is the third and last Dollar Bill Glider of the three Dollar Bill Gliders from Steven Weiss book. Once again this model was intended to be folded with an American dollar bill. for our purpose, any paper divided along the long side will do. If you would like to check out the other 2 gliders please use the links below: Paper Plane 007 : Dollar Bill Glider 1 by Stephen Weiss - https://youtu.be/_67Ye9vuq40 Paper Plane 008 : Dollar Bill Glider 2 by Stephen Weiss - https://youtu.be/wSDaGgTmqwY Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art
